summary.Title: Head chef, Stathelle, Norway
summary.Presentation: Hafsund Feriehytter as / avd Sjøterrassen, Stathelle, Norway, is looking for a head chef.Job descriptionAs the Head Chef at Sjøterrassen, you will be responsible for l

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Hafsund Feriehytter as / avd Sjøterrassen, Stathelle, Norway, is looking for a head chef.

Job description

As the Head Chef at Sjøterrassen, you will be responsible for leading our kitchen, developing the menu, and ensuring the food we serve meets the highest standards and exceeds our guests' expectations. You will work closely with a talented team and play a key role in our community, where teamwork and well-being are at the heart of everything we do.

Your duties will include overseeing daily kitchen operations, training and motivating staff, and managing orders and inventory. We are looking for an experienced and passionate leader who thrives in a dynamic environment and has a love for cooking and leadership.

Skills
  • Leadership and Teamwork
  • Quality Control
  • Communication ++
  • Hygiene and Safety
  • Stress Management
  • Customer Service and Guest Satisfaction
  • Language: speak English or scandinavian must.


Working hours

40 hours week at Hafsundveien 10, 3967 Stathelle, Norway

Period

03.04.2025 untill end of summer or possibly to end of December 2025

Fixed salary

Other information

The head chef will have access to an apartment just a minute's walk from the restaurant. The apartment is fully equipped with a bedroom, bathroom, and an open-plan kitchen and living area, providing a practical and comfortable living space.

More information

Tommy Larsen, +47 9408 6351, Post@sjoterrassen.com

How to apply?

Send your application to Tommy Larsen at Post@sjoterrassen.com
Latest application date is 01.03.2025

(from NAV EURES Norway)



Sjøterrassen is more than just a restaurant – it’s a place where the beauty of nature meets lively activities and great food. Located along the coast, just a short drive from the nearest city, Sjøterrassen is a popular destination for both locals and visitors. Here, guests can enjoy concerts, motorshows, and exciting events while relaxing on our beach or exploring our guest harbor. For our employees, we focus on creating a positive and energetic work environment where well-being is a top priority. We believe that a good team that thrives together produces the best results, which is why we place great emphasis on creating a workplace where everyone feels seen and valued.

Working at Sjøterrassen gives you the opportunity to be part of creating unforgettable experiences for both guests and colleagues in an inspiring seaside setting.

http://www.sjoterrassen.no/
